fields.name: MacBook Air 13-inch with M1 chip
fields.description:
Apple M1 chip delivers powerful CPU, GPU and machine learning performance
Up to 18 hours of battery life so you can go longer than everFootnote1
Retina display with vibrant colours and incredible detail
Superfast SSD storage opens apps and files in an instant
Fanless design for silent operation

fields.name: SIM Free Samsung Galaxy A04s 32GB Mobile Phone - Black
fields.description:
Network:

Network provider: Sim free.
4G network capability.
Dual SIM card phone: supports 2 SIM cards simultaneously.
SIM card type: nano SIM and nano SIM.
Display and Design:

6.5 inch TFT display.
Resolution 720 x 1600 pixels.
With a density of 269 pixels per inch.
Touch screen.
Dimensions:

Size H164.7, W76.9, D9.1mm.
Weight 195g.
Camera and Video:

Dual camera.
Front camera 5MP.
Rear camera 50MP.
Second rear camera 2MP.
Third rear camera 2MP.
LED flash.
Camera features: Portrait, Food, Macro, Panorama, Photo, Portrait, Pro.
Video capture in FHD quality.
Storage:

Internal memory 32GB.
Expandable memory up to 1024GB when using microSD card slot. Boost your storage to hold more tunes, holiday snaps and extra apps.
Technical specifications:

2GHz octa core Exynos 850 processor.
3GB RAM.
Operating system: Android 12.
App store compatibility: Google play store.
Battery:

5000mAh battery capacity.
Product features:

MP3 and MP4 player.
Headphone port.
This phone features fast charge technology - faster than standard charging, for when time is of the essence.
Contactless payment Link up your card to your phone for easy buying.
Fingerprint scanner For simple, safe and speedy unlocking and better security.
Connectivity:

Wi-Fi.
Bluetooth.
NFC.
GPS.
General information:

EAN: 8806094581874.
Manufacturer's 2 year guarantee.

fields.name: 35W Dual USB-C Port Apple Power Adapter
fields.description:
The 35W Dual USB‑C Port Power Adapter allows you to charge two devices at the same time, whether you’re at home, in the office or on the go. Apple recommends using it with MacBook Air. You can also use it with iPhone, iPad, Apple Watch and AirPods.

Pair this power adapter with the World Travel Adapter Kit to charge in other regions around the world.

Charging cable sold separately.

fields.name: Joby TelePod Selfie Stick Mobile Tripod - Black
fields.description:
This selfie stick tripod is designed for mobile! Perfect for vlogging, selfies and more! Securely holds phones, small 360 cams, and phones with 360 camera attachment. Capture shots from a distance with included Bluetooth Impulse remote shutter. Works with multiple JOBY mounts including GripTight ONE (included), GoPro Mount, Flash mount or any ¼ - 20 device under 325g.

Pro-level vlogging tripod with included BallHead 1K works in 4 modes for maximum versatility, use as a handgrip, monopod, elevated stand or telescoping tripod. Includes Bluetooth Impulse remote shutter.

Adjustable centre column.
Non-slip .
Suitable for Large Phone; Point & Shoot Camera; Small Phone.
Holds up to 0.32kg.
Extended height: 56cm.
Folded height: 19.05cm.
Manufacturer's 1 year guarantee.
EAN: 817024015503.

fields.name: iPhone 15 Pro - 128 GB, Natural Titanium
fields.description: Top-of-the-line specs in a titanium body – that's Apple iPhone 15 Pro. Its A17 Pro chip will power through all your browser tabs, apps and games. Doesn't matter if you need to be productive or want to kick back with some Apple TV. The 6.1" Super Retina XDR display will make everything look stunning. As if you'd expect anything less from iPhone. Making memories? Capture them on the 48 MP Pro camera system – it takes images that are full of detail and life. And you can transfer your snaps in no time thanks to the new USB Type-C port,which supports fast charging too. Plus the titanium frame makes this iPhone lighter and more durable than ever.
